name: Let Them Come!
description:
Agents Lance and Lena have finally cornered the evil "Doctor"...but have they bitten off more than they can chew?

HOW TO PLAY: Aim Lance with A/S/D and shoot with W. Aim Lena with Left/Down/Right and shoot with Up.

Score is calculated by time elapsed, number of kills and number of shots! Wasting bullets will lower your score. How long can YOU survive?
